p: A total of 2659 cases of aseptic meningitis were reported from 2013 to 2017 in four geographic regions of the country. Among these cases, 58.4% were from males with minimum and maximum values between 56.4% (2013) and 59.4% (2016), respectively. Among confirmed cases (EV-positive) from 2013 to 2017, the median patient age was five (range = 1–12 years), six (range = 1 month–57 years), four (range = 1month–38 years), four (range = 1 month–54 years) and four (range = 0–33 years) years, respectively.
